casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 13, 2006

[Cite as 12/1312006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-6447.]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2006-1081. Acordia of Ohio, LLC v. Davis.

Hamilton App. No. C-050559. On consideration of appellee’s suggestion of mootness. Sua sponte, the court determines that the cause should be dismissed as moot. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur.
